GNOME: A brief reflection or maxim; a pithy saying.
HONESTY: The act, quality, or condition of being honest.
KNUCKLE: Any of the joints between the phalanges of the fingers.
MNEMONIC: Anything (especially something in verbal form) used to help remember something.
PSALM: A sacred song; a poetical composition for use in the praise or worship of God.
WRAP: To enclose (an object) completely in any flexible, thin material such as fabric or paper.
